descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...an up point shape with different colored squares around it.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make vertical line under the point shape ONLY where there is a square under it, with the same color of the square and draw it down to the bottom.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...an up point shape with different colored squares around it.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make vertical line under the point shape ONLY where there is a square under it, with the same color of the square and draw it down to the bottom.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...an large shape and cubes of a different color
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stay the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make vertical lines from the first empty block under the large shape to the very end only on the grid that have a colored block existing already  under the large area.  The color should be the same as the small cubes already there.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a shape like the head of an arrow surrounded by black with single blocks of a different color randomly spaced around the outside of the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... remains the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... Using the color of the random blocks around the outside, make a row straight down from the arrow head figure to meet any colored blocks below, extending the new row to the end of the grid

annotated_phrases.phrase: a shape like the head of an arrow surrounded by black with single blocks of a different color randomly spaced around the outside of the grid.
Using the color of the random blocks around the outside, make a row straight down from the arrow head figure to meet any colored blocks below, extending the new row to the end of the grid
